name: S60 Web Runtime Widget Package
summary: Learn about .WGZ files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: S60 Web Runtime is a lightweight application framework that enables the easy creation of mobile Web applications.
NOTE: Since WGZ files are compressed with ZIP compression, they can be expanded using a .ZIP decompression utility.

description: Compressed archive that contains a widget, or small program, for Nokia S60-based phones; may include HTML, CSS and JavaScript files; runs via the Web Runtime (WRT) software included with S60 phones.
